text: Desislava Angelova (born 16 October 1997) is a Bulgarian rower. She qualified for the 2024 Summer Olympic Games. She competed at the 2019 World Rowing Championships, 2022 World Rowing Championships , She placed seventh in Women's single sculls at the 2022 European Rowing Championships, and fifth at the 2024 European Rowing Championships. She placed fifth in Women's single sculls at the 2023 World Rowing Championships, == References == Category:1997 births
title: Desislava Angelova
